title: 90 58 13 "Doc Rock""Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms! Miracle in the Drum Rockies!"Transliteration: "Hiruruku no sakura! Doramu Rokkī no kiseki" (Japanese:ヒルルクの桜!ドラムロッキーの奇跡) Munehisa Sakai Michiru Shimada December 2, 2001(2001-12-02)[24] November 12, 2005[25]
